means: 分配( assign的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Tracking assigns some students to college prep and others to vocational programs.
sentence.Network_cn: 按照能力，一些学生被分到大学预科班，另一些则被分到职业培训班。

sentence.Network_en: Every year a national plan outlines and assigns special problems for research.
sentence.Network_cn: 每年国家规划并分配特别的研究题目.

sentence.Network_en: Your teacher assigns you work to be done at home.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的老师会分配家庭作业给你.

entry.def: If you assign a piece of work to someone, you give them the work to do.

example.ex: When I taught, I would assign a topic to children which they would write about...
example.tran: 我教课时会给孩子们布置一个题目，让他们就这个题目写点东西。

example.ex: Later in the year, she'll assign them research papers...
example.tran: 今年晚些时候，她将给他们指定研究论文。

entry.def: If you assign something to someone, you say that it is for their use.

example.ex: The selling broker is then required to assign a portion of the commission to the buyer broker...
example.tran: 卖方经纪人须随后将部分佣金分给买方经纪人。

example.ex: He assigned her all his land in Ireland.
example.tran: 他把自己在爱尔兰的所有土地都转给了她。

entry.def: If someone is assigned to a particular place, group, or person, they are sent there, usually in order to work at that place or for that person.

example.ex: I was assigned to Troop A of the 10th Cavalry...
example.tran: 我被派往第10骑兵队的A连。

example.ex: Did you choose Russia or were you simply assigned there?...
example.tran: 你是自己选择去的俄罗斯还是就是被派到那里的？

entry.def: If you assign a particular function or value to someone or something, you say they have it.

example.ex: Under Mr. Harel's system, each business must assign a value to each job...
example.tran: 根据哈雷尔先生的体系，每个企业必须赋予每份工作一定的价值。

example.ex: Assign the letters of the alphabet their numerical values — A equals 1, B equals 2, etc.
example.tran: 给字母表里的每个字母赋予相应的数值——A等于1，B等于2，等等。

auth_sentence.content: To keep workers busy, Hercules assigns them to paint rails and pipes.
auth_sentence.res_content: To keep workers busy, Hercules assigns them to paint rails and pipes.

Sentence.sentence: The school randomly assigns roommates without regard to race
